title: How to Make a St Brigid's Cross with Pipe Cleaners

steps.title: Get 8 same length pipe cleaners and fold them in half.
steps.content: Get 8 same length pipe cleaners and fold them in half.

steps.title: Use 2 of the pipe cleaners and slot them into each other.
steps.content: Use 2 of the pipe cleaners and slot them into each other.

steps.title: Next slot another pipe cleaner over the other two at a right angle.
steps.content: Next slot another pipe cleaner over the other two at a right angle.

steps.title: Then step 3 on the opposite side.
steps.content: Then step 3 on the opposite side.

steps.title: Now put a pipe cleaner sideways over the last pipe cleaner used.
steps.content: Now put a pipe cleaner sideways over the last pipe cleaner used.

steps.title: Cut a 9th unfolded pipe cleaner into quarters.
steps.content: Cut a 9th unfolded pipe cleaner into quarters.

steps.title: Twist each quarter around each end and trim the ends.
steps.content: Twist each quarter around each end and trim the ends.
